DOC.brief_summary: This prospective study examine psychosocial improvement among CF adolescent caregiver go Stress Management Resiliency Training - Relaxation Response Resiliency Program ( SMART-3RP ) .
DOC.brief_title: Resiliency Training Adolescents With Craniofacial Conditions Their Caregivers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Adolescent Patients : 1 . Adolescents age 14 22 2 . English fluency literacy 3 . Diagnosis craniofacial condition self report Inclusion Criteria Parents Other Caregivers : 1 . Must 18 year age old 2 . English fluency literacy 3 . Parent caregiver child young adult craniofacial condition 1 . Unable benefit program due cognitive , psychiatric reason base opinion group leader 2 . Unable unwilling sign inform consent document
